mapper.sql:
a.id, a.create_date as 'createDate', a.create_user as createUser, a.update_date as 'updateDate', a.update_user as updateUser, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.remark,
a.password, a.port, a.server_id as serverId, a.start_sh as startSh, a.status, a.status_sh as statusSh, a.stop_sh as stopSh, a.other_1 as dockerName, a.version
